div.pre: 1301 Troas or Mysia, 1947 or earlier Burial: c. 220-210 B.C. (M) Contents: 200+ AR Antigonus Gonatas: c. 100 tetradr. Antigonus Doson: c. 50 tetradr. Prusias I: 1 tetradr. Antiochus II: 1 tetradr. (Myrina as WSM 1527) Antiochus Hierax: 2 tetradr. (Lampsacus 1 as WSM 1541; Alexandreia Troas 1 as WSM 1590) Disposition: dispersed Information from E. S. G. Robinson The hd. was said also to contain tetradr. of Alexander, Lysimachus and the At- talids
